DOC.brief_title: Pericapsular Exparel Pain Relief Bunionectomy Related Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose prospective , randomize , single-blinded study patient elect undergo outpatient first metatarsophalangeal ( MTP ) joint procedure ( bunionectomy , 1st MTP fusion , cheilectomy ) . As standard , patient undergoing procedure give regional anesthesia ( adductor canal block plus popliteal block ) . Patients give prescription oral opioids manage post-operative pain . The purpose study determine whether single intrapopliteal administration Exparel , conjunction standard care regional block , improve pain relief therefore decrease use post-operative opioids .
